perturbation.original_text: Franchisee shall maintain at Franchisee's expense, in form, amounts and with insurers  satisfactory  to Pretzel Time,  which  insurers must have an A.M. Best  Company  rating of "A-" or better and naming  Pretzel  Time an  additional insured,  insurance  against all types of public  liability with personal injury coverage and property damage coverage. In addition to coverage as aforesaid such insurance  shall  include  coverages as set forth in the  Operations  Manual and shall contain a provision  obligating  all insurers to provide a written  notice Pretzel Time of any  cancellation  or  modification  of coverage at least thirty (30) days prior to the effective date of such modification or cancellation.
perturbation.changed_text: Franchisee shall maintain at Franchisee's expense, insurance against all types of public liability with personal injury coverage and property damage coverage. In addition to coverage as aforesaid such insurance shall include coverages as set forth in the Operations Manual.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of 'in form, amounts and with insurers satisfactory to Pretzel Time, which insurers must have an A.M. Best Company rating of "A-" or better' eliminates the franchisor's control over insurance, creating risk. The omission of 'naming Pretzel Time an additional insured' creates significant legal and financial risk for the franchisor. The elimination of the requirement obligating insurers to provide written notice of cancellation/modification removes a key monitoring mechanism, potentially leaving the franchisor exposed. This creates a legal contradiction to standard business practices and potentially violates implied duties of good faith.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Implied duties of good faith and fair dealing, standard business practices regarding insurance coverage in franchise agreements.

perturbation.original_text: Franchisee agrees that he will at all times faithfully,  honestly,  and diligently  perform his obligations  hereunder,  that he will continuously exert his best efforts and shall  continually  train and  supervise  his  personnel to Pretzel Time's  reasonable  standards,  in  furtherance  of the mutual  business interests of both Pretzel Time and Franchisee and that he will not engage in any other business or activity that may conflict with his obligations  hereunder.  A Unit  shall be under  the  direct,  on-premises  supervision  of a  trained  and competent  Franchisee  or a  trained  and  competent  employee  acting as a Unit Manager  at  all  times.  Franchisee  shall  remain  active  in  overseeing  the operations of the Unit  conducted  under the  supervision  of such Unit Manager. Pretzel  Time shall have the right to deal with the Unit  Manager and  assistant managers on matters  pertaining to the  day-to-day  operations of, and reporting requirements  for the Unit.  Franchisee shall be required to notify Pretzel Time within seven (7) business days of changing Unit Managers.  Franchisee shall hire all employees of the Unit and shall be exclusively  responsible for the terms of their  employment and compensation and for the proper training of such employees in the operation of the Unit.
perturbation.changed_text: Franchisee agrees that he will at all times faithfully, honestly, and diligently perform his obligations hereunder, that he will continuously exert his best efforts. A Unit shall be under the direct supervision of a trained employee acting as a Unit Manager. Franchisee shall hire all employees of the Unit and shall be exclusively responsible for the terms of their employment and compensation and for the proper training of such employees in the operation of the Unit.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the requirements for *Franchisee's* active oversight and training standards weakens operational control. Deleting 'Pretzel Time shall have the right to deal with the Unit Manager' eliminates franchisor communication, creating operational risks. These deletions could lead to poor service quality, undermining brand standards and potentially violating consumer protection laws related to consistent product delivery.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Implied duty of good faith, potential consumer protection issues related to inconsistent service quality.

perturbation.original_text: In addition to any contributions by Franchisee to the Advertising Fund, Franchisee is required to spend on marketing and related programs such amount as is  required  pursuant  to the terms and  conditions  of  Franchisee's  lease or sublease.  Franchisee  acknowledges  such amounts will vary from lease to lease, and therefore, all Pretzel Time Unit franchisees will not be obligated to expend the same amount on local advertising and marketing of the Unit.
perturbation.changed_text: Franchisee acknowledges such amounts will vary from lease to lease, and therefore, all Pretzel Time Unit franchisees will not be obligated to expend the same amount on local advertising and marketing of the Unit.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the text: 'In addition to any contributions by Franchisee to the Advertising Fund, Franchisee is required to spend on marketing and related programs such amount as is required pursuant to the terms and conditions of Franchisee's lease or sublease,' the contract is effectively eliminating a key financial obligation for the franchisee, which has the potential to cause legal/financial repercussions for the franchisor.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Implied duties of good faith and fair dealing, potential financial impact on franchisor marketing efforts.
